thread.section_title: Vapornation Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vapornation | vapornation.com | 2 of 90
thread.title: Susan Hayden

author: Susan Hayden
title: Susan Hayden
text: I ordered the wrong part- entirely my error but when I contacted them to see if there was any way this part could be made to work or if it could be returned I received an automated response promising a real person follow up but no follow up was received . This was not an expensive item so I just ordered the correct part from another vendor but would not recommend purchasing from them.
